name: agat_convert_sp_gxf2gxf.pl

options.description: String - Input GTF/GFF file. Compressed file with .gz extension is accepted.
Integer - Verbose option. To modify verbosity. Default is 1. 0 is quiet, 2 and 3 are increasing verbosity.
String - Output GFF file. If no output file is specified, the output will be written to STDOUT.

tldr:
> Another GFF Analysis Toolkit
> More information <https://github.com/NBISweden/AGAT>

- Sanitize a GFF file into a proper GFF3 format

`agat_convert_sp_gxf2gxf.pl --gff {{test.gff}}`
